description: It is believed that the small fire was at Richard Lee Primary School in Coventry.
title: Coventry school toilet fire may have been deliberate, say police
title_page: Coventry school toilet fire may have been deliberate, say police - BBC News
maintext:
Police have said that a fire in a school toilet is "suspected of being started deliberately".
Emergency services said they were called to a school, believed to be Richard Lee Primary School, on The Drive in Coventry on Monday morning.
Firefighters said they found a small fire in a toilet area, adding that the school was evacuated before they arrived and no one was injured.
West Midlands Police said they were "called following a fire in a school toilet on The Drive" and it was "suspected of being started deliberately".
